sentences.english: This tune is a representative piece of Hebei folk instrumental music.
sentences.chinese: 此曲是河北民间器乐曲中具有代表性的作品之一。

sentences.english: Vocal and instrumental music is divided into two departments.
sentences.chinese: 分为声乐和器乐两大部门。

sentences.english: The calming music, drowns out environmental noise, especially if it's mostly instrumental.
sentences.chinese: 轻音乐会掩盖周围的环境噪音，特别是器乐曲。

sentences.english: Piece of instrumental music in several movements, usually in chance style.
sentences.chinese: 富舞曲节奏的多乐章器乐曲。

sentences.english: Henan Bantou is one kind of a traditional Chinese instrumental music of a string cable.
sentences.chinese: 河南板头曲是中国传统器乐弦索乐的一种。

sentences.english: There are four instrumentalists and one singer in the group.
sentences.chinese: 那乐团有四位器乐家和一位歌手。

sentences.english: My younger sister wants to be an instrumentalist.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹想当一个器乐演奏家。

sentences.english: The Instrumental Music of Schmeltzer, Biber, Muffat and their Contemporaries.
sentences.chinese: 施梅尔泽，拜伯，马菲特和其他当代音乐家的器乐。
这首器乐曲编得特别细致。

sentences.english: The local chamber of commerce provides some financial support for showing instruments at fairs and exhibitions.
sentences.chinese: 当地商会对器乐展销会和展览会提供经济赞助。

sentences.english: A lively and capricious instrumental composition.
The baroque age brought a new interest in instrumental music.
sentences.chinese: 在巴罗克时期，人们重新对器乐产生了兴趣。

sentences.english: Like "MK1, " this is a short (fifty-three seconds) keyboard instrumental.
sentences.chinese: 就像“MK1”一样，这是首简短的53秒键盘器乐。

sentences.english: My younger brother wants to be an instrumentalist.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟想当一个器乐家。

sentences.english: This paper explores the approach for higher normal musical instrument students to improve practice efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 本文对提高高师器乐学生练琴效率的途径加以探析。

definition: musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
zither or guzheng/large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
to perform on a musical instrument
